text: Di king ga dangidangi, gei tama daane a maa gu deai dono hagadagadagagee ai. Nia daangada ga polepole i nadau mmaadagu. Au ga hagaduadua goodou gi godou hangaahai ala ne hai, gei ga hagi aga goodou gii hai be di godou hai dela ne hagi aga digau ala i golo. Deenei e hagamodongoohia adu gi goodou bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.”
